dt: consisting of two members or parts that are usually joined

dt: a situation in which one has to choose between two or more equally unsatisfactory choices

dt.t: the {it}double bind{/it} faced by every politician: responding to scurrilous charges only gives them unwarranted publicity; not responding to such charges is often interpreted as an admission of guilt

shortdef: a situation in which one has to choose between two or more equally unsatisfactory choices
